content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: OH.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: HELLO LITTLE ONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: I WAS NOT EXPECTING TO SEE ONE SUCH AS YOURSELF.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: IT HAS BEEN A LONG TIME SINCE ANY OF YOUR KIND

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: CAME TO VISIT ME.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: MANY YEARS. MORE THAN YOU CAN IMAGINE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: MORTAL MINDS CANNOT FATHOM ETERNITY.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: HOW IT STRETCHES. HOW IT MARCHES EVER ONWARD.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: YOU ARE TOO SMALL FOR IT.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: YOU COULD NOT BEAR THE WEIGHT, I DON'T THINK.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: BUT THAT IS OKAY.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: I BEAR IT BECAUSE I CAN.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: BUT IT CAN GET LONELY, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: SO VERY LONELY.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: I AM NOT SO DIFFERENT FROM YOU, IN THAT WAY.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: EVEN I AM NOT MEANT TO BE ALONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: NOT FOREVER.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: I HAVE A GIFT, YOU SEE. I CAN GIVE SOMEONE ETERNITY.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: BUT ONLY ONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: IT IS A HEAVY BURDEN, CAN YOU IMAGINE?

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: TO KNOW YOU CAN SPEND ALL OF TIME WITH SOMEONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: AND THAT YOU HAVE TO DECIDE WHO IS WORTH IT.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: STILL, THERE IS SOMETHING...PLEASING ABOUT THE THOUGHT.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: TO FIND ONE GREAT LOVE, THAT WILL OUTLAST ALL THE STARS.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: IT'S A BEAUTIFUL IDEA, DON'T YOU AGREE?

options.text: That feels like a lot to put on one person.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: I AM GLAD TO HEAR IT, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: IT IS LOVELY. IT BRINGS ME HOPE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: SOMEWHERE, SOMEWHEN, THERE IS THE PERSON FOR ME.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: THE PERSON WHO WILL BE AT MY SIDE FOR ALL THE AGES OF THIS UNIVERSE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: THAT IS A LIGHT IN THE DEPTHS OF MY LONESOMENESS

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: KNOWING THAT IT WILL NOT LAST FOREVER.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: YOU HAVE BEEN MOST KIND TO LISTEN TO ME, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: PERHAPS YOU WILL COME TO LISTEN AGAIN, SOMETIME.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: PERHAPS YOU ARE CORRECT.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: FOREVER IS, ITSELF, A HEAVY BURDEN.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: AND NOT ONE MANY ARE SUITED FOR.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: IT IS A CURSE AS MUCH AS A BLESSING, I THINK.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: SOMETIMES.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: BUT EITHER WAY, IT IS MINE TO BEAR.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: I ONLY HOPE I DO NOT HAVE TO BEAR IT ALONE FOR MUCH LONGER.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: YOU HAVE GIVEN ME SOMETHING TO THINK ABOUT, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: FOR THAT, YOU HAVE MY THANKS.

content.name: Delta-Doom
content.dialogue: AND MY GOODWILL, ON YOUR JOURNEY FORWARD.
